mapper.select: SELECT od.order_id, od.order_num, od.total_price, od.create_time, us.wx_open_id, info.authorizer_id, info.authorizer_app_id, info.service_type_info, ms.wx_template_id, (select product_name from weiit_order_item where order_id = od.order_id order by id asc limit 1 ) product_name FROM weiit_order od, weiit_user us, weiit_weixin_public_info info , weiit_weixin_public_template_msg ms, weiit_weixin_public_template_type tt where od.state=0 and od.user_id=us.user_id and od.shop_id=info.shop_id and us.open_id_type=info.service_type_info and info.authorizer_id=ms.authorizer_id and ms.template_type_id=tt.template_type_id and ms.state=1 and tt.business_type=#{business_type} and od.create_time < #{create_time}
